org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple

Class SimpleRiverContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple.SimpleRiverContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiverContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnRiverContext

    public class SimpleRiverContext
extends Object
implements RiverContext
    The river context consists of the parameters that span source and mouth settings. It represents the river state, for supporting the river task execution, and river scripting.
